meanings.definition: schlumpiest (adjective): superlative form of schlumpy, meaning messy or unkempt in appearance
meanings.sent1: The schlumpiest room in the house was always his bedroom, with clothes strewn everywhere.
meanings.sent2: She looked schlumpiest in the morning, with bed hair and wrinkled pajamas.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, he always ended up looking schlumpiest on lazy Sundays.
meanings.sent4: The garden after the storm was the schlumpiest sight, with uprooted plants and scattered debris.
meanings.sent5: The schlumpiest cat in the neighborhood had fur sticking out in all directions.
